properties.description: PG데이터 lake에 이동 및 테이블 데이터 삭제

query.value:
select format(
    'select * from %I.%I where %I <= %s',
    schema_name,
    table_name,
    date_column_name,
    case
        when date_column_type = 'timestamp'
        then
            format(
                'now() - interval ''1 %s'' * %s',
                retention_unit,
                retention_value
            )
        when date_column_type = 'yyyy-mm-dd'
        then 
        	format(
        		'to_char(current_date - interval ''%s %s'', ''yyyy-mm-dd'')',
                retention_value,
                retention_unit
        	)
        else
            format(
                'current_date - interval ''%s %s''',
                retention_value,
                retention_unit
            )
    end
) as select_query,
format(
    'delete from %I.%I where %I <= %s',
    schema_name,
    table_name,
    date_column_name,
    case
        when date_column_type = 'timestamp'
        then
            format(
                'now() - interval ''1 %s'' * %s',
                retention_unit,
                retention_value
            )
        when date_column_type = 'yyyy-mm-dd'
        then 
        	format(
        		'to_char(current_date - interval ''%s %s'', ''yyyy-mm-dd'')',
                retention_value,
                retention_unit
        	)
        else
            format(
                'current_date - interval ''%s %s''',
                retention_value,
                retention_unit
            )
    end
) as delete_query,
policy_id, lake_container, lake_path_template, schema_name,table_name,  date_column_name, table_storage_type, delete_strategy,retention_value, retention_unit
from cd_meta.table_retention_policy
where is_active = true

update cd_meta.table_retention_policy set last_upd_dt = now() , is_active  = (case when '@{item().retention_value}' = '0' and '@{item().retention_unit}' = 'year' then false  else true  end) where policy_id = @{item().policy_id};

select 1 as success
